full_summary:
# Pest Control Services Solicitation

### Details

* **Tender Reference:** WS4318486486
* **Publication Date:** January 23, 2024
* **Tender Closes:** February 19, 2024, 2:00 pm (EST)
* **Solicitation Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RSO)

### Background

The Canadian government, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites bids for Pest Control Services to support the Department of National Defence (DND). This Solicitation number is WS4318486486.

### Tender Opportunity

The PSPC will award a Standing Offer (SO) to the successful supplier to provide pest control services to DND for a 6-month period post-award. The supplier will be expected to provide personnel, equipment, and vehicles as required. Successful bidders must have a proven track record of providing high-quality pest control services.

### Security Requirements

The bidders must review and acknowledge the security requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

### Registration and Authentication

Bidders are required to register on the Canadian Government's electronic tendering website to access solicitation documents and bid electronically.

### Selection Criteria

* Highest Responsiveness, Trending Score (GBT) in the ePER System (30%)
* Price (70%)

### Important Dates

* Tender Submission Deadline: February 19, 2024 at 2:00 pm (EST)
* Contact Information:
Kate Mintzer (SPAC/PSPC)
kayla.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
--- END OF SPECIFICATIONS


### Trade Agreement

The bidder must adhere to the trade agreements listed below:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (C-UK TCA)
* Canada – Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada – Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
